item.title: Network
item.description: About IPV6 things OpenWRT IPv6 三种配置方式 List opened ports and program own them. sudo lsof -i sudo netstat -lptu sudo netstat -tulpn Which port bounded to port 22 sudo lsof -i :22 多网卡 Ref.1:多网卡配置使用ip route Gentoo 多网卡、静态路由
